snippet: Interpublic’s investment reflects a growing demand among advertising and media companies for new kinds of data on television viewership, particularly as viewing moves online.
abstract: Interpublic Group of Companies announces that it is buying minority stake in Samba TV in effort to understand how consumers are watching television.
lead_paragraph: Interpublic’s investment reflects a growing demand among advertising and media companies for new kinds of data on television viewership, particularly as viewing moves online.

headline.main: Interpublic to Buy Minority Stake in Samba TV, a Start-Up for TV Analytics
headline.print_headline: Interpublic to Buy Minority Stake in Samba TV, a Television Analytics Firm
